name: AR-Monster-Truck
description:
AR-Monster-Truck is an augmented reality, mini remote control (RC) Monster Truck simulator game. Point your iPhone/iPad to the ground, hit the start button, and drive!

This is what's included:

- A stunning RC Monster Truck that not only looks real, but plays like the real thing too!

- Two hazard barrels for some insane figure 8 drifting!

- An epic tune playing on the radio!

- Slow motion effect for some sick visuals, and fine control drifting!

** Important Message: It might take a few minutes to get the hang of AR driving, but once you do... you'll want to keep on truckin'.
